name: WhaleSoft
tagline: at quality. ahead of time. under budget.
description:
Whalesoft is an ambitious and coherent team of professional programmers which specializing in web development, mobile integration, web UI/UX, application development and email marketing. Among our partners are individual customers, companies and large international corporations from the USA, Europe, the Middle East and other regions.
Our technology stack includes:
JavaScript / ES6 / AJAX / Angular.js / React.js / Node.js / jQuery / extJs
PHP / Yii / Yii2 / phalcon.php / Zend / CodeIgniter / Laravel
